resources.string: FAQs: 1 - Who is this app for exactly? This app is designed and made especially for Fastians and gives you great help in getting content to help in studies. 2 - Will there be more courses added to this app in the future? ---- Yes, with time we shall be including all major courses offered at FAST so students can access them easily. 3 - Is it just content related to university? ---- No, as you can go look at the paid courses section we have content that is not taught at FAST but is still very useful for any student. 4 - Who manages all this and uploads all this content? ---- We are a group of students from FAST who have made this app and upload content that we have been taught in FAST.
1 - This was a well explained course however it lacked a practical viewpoint of some concepts.
1 - The course was well designed but it could have been made better by giving more detailed assignments.
1 - An amazingly taught course and very good implementations done.

Practical Deep Learning with Keras and Python
